# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional item that holds significant value for us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs. We propose a price of $12,000 for this product. We believe this offer strikes a balance between the value we place on it and the benefits it could bring to you. We look forward to hearing your thoughts on this opportunity. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
